name: rollup-plugin-node-globals
description: insert the same globals browserify does

scripts.build: rollup -c -f cjs -o dist/rollup-plugin-node-globals.cjs.js && rollup -c -f es6 -o dist/rollup-plugin-node-globals.es6.js
scripts.create-buffer: browserify src/buffer-raw.js | derequire | derequire --from module --to ___mod | derequire --from exports --to _expor_ > tmp/buffer-raw.js
scripts.prebuild: rm -rf dist && rm -rf tmp && mkdir tmp && mkdir dist && npm run create-buffer && cat src/buffer-prefix.js tmp/buffer-raw.js src/buffer-suffix.js > dist/buffer.js && rm -rf tmp

author: Calvin Metcalf <calvin.metcalf@gmail.com>
